DOC.brief_summary: Patients intervention arm view 23-minute video depict Hematopoietic stem cell transplantation ( HSCT ) experience . Patients control arm receive HSCT frequently ask question ( FAQ ) sheet develop National Cancer Institute ( NCI ) National Institutes Health ( NIH ) .
DOC.detailed_description: The study 's overall goal 1 ) improve outcome ; 2 ) increase satisfaction physician consultation . Patients randomized intervention control data collect three time point ( treatment , 30 day post-HSCT 12 month post-HSCT ) .
DOC.criteria: Cancer patient schedule HSCT Patients receive HSCT previously Patients speak English
